doc:
Marcia Haufrecht https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marcia_Haufrecht 0 Marcia Haufrecht (born January 3, 1937 as Marcia Haufreucht) is an American actress, playwright and director, as well as a noted acting teacher and coach. A life member of The Actors Studio, and a longtime member of The Ensemble Studio Theatre, she is also the founder and artistic director of the Off-Off-Broadway company (and venue), The Common Basis Theatre (originally The Common Ground Theatre). Marcia_Haufrecht ( born January_3_,_1937 as Marcia_Haufreucht ) is an_American_actress , playwright_and_director , as_well_as a_noted_acting_teacher_and_coach . A_life_member of The_Actors_Studio , and a_longtime_member of The_Ensemble_Studio_Theatre , she is also the_founder_and_artistic_director of the_Off-Off-Broadway_company_(_and_venue_) , The_Common_Basis_Theatre (_originally The_Common_Ground_Theatre_) .
